wikipedia_page.main: Richard Allan Tomlinson, FSA (born 25 April 1932), publishes under R. A. Tomlinson, is a British archaeologist. He was Professor of Ancient History and Archaeology at the University of Birmingham from 1971 to 1995. He was Director of the British School at Athens from 1995 to 1996.

response: Richard Tomlinson (born 1963) is a New Zealand-born British former Secret Intelligence Service (MI6) officer.
Richard Tomlinson may also refer to:
*Richard Tomlinson (MP), Member of Parliament (MP) for Weymouth and Melcombe Regis
